name: E360player
tagline: E360Player is the 360° Video Player with electron.
body:
# E360Player

`E360Player` is the `360° Video Player ` with [electron](https://github.com/atom/electron).

## Screenshot

![Screenshot](screenshot.png)

## Features

| Item          | Description       | Support |
| ------------- |:-----------------:| -------:|
| Video Format  | mp4(H.264)        |   Yes   |
| Video Type    | 360° Video        |   Yes   |
| Mouse Control | Change PhiDelta   |   Yes   |
| Mouse Control | Change ThetaDelta |   Yes   |
| Play Control  | Play Progress     |   Yes   |
| Play Control  | Next Video        |   Yes   |
| Play Control  | Prev Video        |   Yes   |
| Play Control  | Fast Backward     |   Yes   |
| Play Control  | Fast Forward      |   Yes   |
| Play Control  | Full Screen       |   Yes   |
| Play Control  | Play Video        |   Yes   |
| Play Control  | Pause Video       |   Yes   |
| Play Control  | Open Video File   |   Yes   |
| Play Control  | Open Online Video |   Yes   |
| Settings      | Switch Language   |   Yes   |
| Play List     | Drag & Drop Item  |   Yes   |
| Play List     | Toggle ListView   |   Yes   |
| Flat Screen   | Toggle FlatScreen |   Yes   |
| Flat Screen   | Change Fov        |   Yes   |
